userStory: As a user, I want to manage product quantities from the Quantity Pop-up on SRP so that I can add, update, or remove items easily.

testCases.title: Validate Quantity Pop-up is present on SRP
testCases.preconditions: User is on SRP with available SKU.
testCases.steps:
1. Search for SKU
2. On SRP, tap on 'Add to cart' of available SKU
testCases.expected:
1. Quantity Pop-up should be present
2. Quantity list should be present in ascending order

testCases.title: Validate selection of quantity from Quantity Pop-up on SRP
testCases.preconditions: User is on SRP with available SKU.
testCases.steps:
1. Search for SKU
2. On SRP, tap on 'Add to cart'
3. Select 1st present quantity from pop-up
testCases.expected:
1. Selected quantity should be highlighted
2. Pop-up should disappear after 500ms
3. Selected quantity should be reflected in product quantity button

testCases.title: Validate updating quantity from Quantity Pop-up on SRP
testCases.preconditions: User has already selected a quantity for the SKU on SRP.
testCases.steps:
1. Search for SKU
2. On SRP, tap 'Add to cart'
3. Select 1st present quantity from pop-up
4. Tap on quantity selection button
5. Select 2nd present quantity from pop-up
testCases.expected:
1. Quantity Pop-up shows highlighted quantity already selected
2. Updated quantity is highlighted
3. Pop-up disappears after 500ms
4. Updated quantity is reflected in product quantity button

testCases.title: Validate removing product quantity from Quantity Pop-up on SRP
testCases.preconditions: User has already selected a quantity for the SKU on SRP.
testCases.steps:
1. Search for SKU
2. On SRP, tap 'Add to cart'
3. Select 1st present quantity from pop-up
4. Tap quantity selection button
5. Tap on 'Remove' button
testCases.expected:
1. Quantity Pop-up shows highlighted quantity
2. After removing, no quantity is highlighted
3. Pop-up disappears after 500ms
4. 'Add to cart' button is present

testCases.title: Validate selected quantity on SRP is reflected on Cart Page
testCases.preconditions: User has selected a quantity from Quantity Pop-up on SRP.
testCases.steps:
1. Search for SKU
2. On SRP, tap 'Add to cart'
3. Select 1st present quantity from pop-up
4. Go to Cart Page
testCases.expected: Selected quantity should be present on cart page against the same product

testCases.title: Validate selected quantity on SRP is reflected on PDP
testCases.preconditions: User has selected a quantity from Quantity Pop-up on SRP.
testCases.steps:
1. Search for SKU
2. On SRP, tap 'Add to cart'
3. Select 1st present quantity from pop-up
4. Go to PDP of the same product
testCases.expected: Selected quantity should be present on PDP of the same product

testCases.title: Validate quantity list is scrollable in Quantity Pop-up on SRP
testCases.preconditions: User is on SRP with available SKU.
testCases.steps:
1. Search for SKU
2. On SRP, tap 'Add to cart'
3. Scroll down in quantity list
testCases.expected: Scroll happens and quantity numbers change in ascending order

testCases.title: Validate Quantity Pop-up closes on tapping cross icon on SRP
testCases.preconditions: User is on SRP with Quantity Pop-up open.
testCases.steps:
1. Search for SKU
2. On SRP, tap 'Add to cart'
3. Tap cross icon
testCases.expected:
1. Pop-up closes
2. 'Add to cart' button is present

testCases.title: Validate recommendation tag is shown in Quantity Pop-up on SRP
testCases.preconditions: User is on SRP with available SKU.
testCases.steps:
1. Search for SKU
2. On SRP, tap 'Add to cart'
testCases.expected: Recommendation tag should be present on the recommended quantity

testCases.title: Validate discounted price is shown in Quantity Pop-up on SRP
testCases.preconditions: User is on SRP with discounted SKU.
testCases.steps:
1. Search for SKU
2. On SRP, tap 'Add to cart'
testCases.expected: Discounted price should be present
